name: easy-peasy-svgeezy
description: Example code for generating SVG sprites on the fly using svg-sprite and NPM scripts

scripts.update-sprite-with-preview: svg-sprite -s --symbol-dest icons --symbol-sprite icons.svg --symbol-example true --symbol-example-dest index.html icons/individual-icons/*.svg && cd icons && python -m SimpleHTTPServer

author: Julia Tokumaru
